sentence.Network_en: Looking at her watch, Miss Pao said, " I'm going down to sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍小姐看着手表道: “ 我要下去睡了.

sentence.Network_en: Miss Pao looked elsewhere, pretending she knew nothing about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍小姐眼望别处, 只做不知道.

sentence.Network_en: He could not understand why Miss Pao had suddenly changed her attitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想不出鲍小姐为什么会改变态度.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Taoist Trinity

auth_sentence.content: General Vang Pao is our greatest leader and will remain this way.
auth_sentence.res_content: General Vang Pao is our greatest leader and will remain this way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: General Vang Pao is our greatest leader and will remain this way.

auth_sentence.content: Nguyen Vinh Tien, a 33-year-old architect, has watched these changes closely.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nguyen Vinh Tien, a 33-year-old architect, has watched these changes closely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nguyen Vinh Tien, a 33-year-old architect, has watched these changes closely.

auth_sentence.content: In Pao Ding's eyes, cows were nothing but bones and edible flesh.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Pao Ding's eyes, cows were nothing but bones and edible flesh.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In Pao Ding's eyes, cows were nothing but bones and edible flesh.
